sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_COLUMNS
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_CONTEXT
	   ,CT.[JobVersionId] AS CT_JobVersionId
	  ,F.[JobVersionId]
      ,F.[JobId]
      ,F.[JobVersion]
      ,F.[JobStatus]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[PackagingReference],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PackagingReference]
      ,F.[BookedDateTime]
      ,F.[JobRangeId]
      ,F.[Retailer]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[Brand],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Brand]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[Variety],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Variety]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[Promotion],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Promotion]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[Weight],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Weight]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[LanguageDesc],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [LanguageDesc]
      ,F.[PlateSizeUnitId]
      ,F.[TransferMethod]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[TransferNotes],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [TransferNotes]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[SessionId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [SessionId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[LegacyDesignNo],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [LegacyDesignNo]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[DespatchNotes],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [DespatchNotes]
      ,F.[ProjectId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[MAPSDesignRef],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [MAPSDesignRef]
      ,F.[MAPSBriefId]
      ,F.[MAPSLinked]
      ,F.[Priority]
      ,F.[FormattedJobNumber]
      ,F.[ClonedJobVersionId]
      ,F.[ArtReceived]
      ,F.[EndUserInfoReceived]
      ,F.[PrinterInfoReceived]
      ,F.[LastInfoReceived]
      ,F.[OrderTypeId]
      ,F.[PackTypeId]
      ,F.[JobRelationshipId]
      ,F.[ImportedContentSource]
      ,F.[OverallJobDueDate]
      ,F.[JobRelationship]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[ISOLanguageCodes],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ISOLanguageCodes]
      ,F.[WordCount]
      ,F.[LanguageCount]
      ,F.[InvoicingStatusId]
FROM CHANGETABLE(CHANGES dbo.tbl_job_versions,@{activity('LookupOld').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) CT
LEFT JOIN dbo.tbl_job_versions F
 ON F.[JobVersionId] = CT.[JobVersionId]
WHERE CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION IS NOT NULL
AND ISNULL(CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION,0) <= @{activity('LookupNew').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}

SELECT  CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_COLUMNS
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_CONTEXT
	   ,CT.[JobVersionId] AS CT_JobVersionId
	  ,F.[JobVersionId]
      ,F.[JobId]
      ,F.[JobVersion]
      ,F.[JobStatus]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[PackagingReference],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PackagingReference]
      ,F.[BookedDateTime]
      ,F.[JobRangeId]
      ,F.[Retailer]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[Brand],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Brand]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[Variety],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Variety]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[Promotion],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Promotion]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[Weight],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Weight]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[LanguageDesc],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [LanguageDesc]
      ,F.[PlateSizeUnitId]
      ,F.[TransferMethod]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[TransferNotes],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [TransferNotes]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[SessionId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [SessionId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[LegacyDesignNo],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [LegacyDesignNo]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[DespatchNotes],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [DespatchNotes]
      ,F.[ProjectId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[MAPSDesignRef],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [MAPSDesignRef]
      ,F.[MAPSBriefId]
      ,F.[MAPSLinked]
      ,F.[Priority]
      ,F.[FormattedJobNumber]
      ,F.[ClonedJobVersionId]
      ,F.[ArtReceived]
      ,F.[EndUserInfoReceived]
      ,F.[PrinterInfoReceived]
      ,F.[LastInfoReceived]
      ,F.[OrderTypeId]
      ,F.[PackTypeId]
      ,F.[JobRelationshipId]
      ,F.[ImportedContentSource]
      ,F.[OverallJobDueDate]
      ,F.[JobRelationship]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(F.[ISOLanguageCodes],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ISOLanguageCodes]
      ,F.[WordCount]
      ,F.[LanguageCount]
      ,F.[InvoicingStatusId]
FROM CHANGETABLE(CHANGES dbo.tbl_job_versions,@{activity('LookupOld').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) CT
LEFT JOIN dbo.tbl_job_versions F
 ON F.[JobVersionId] = CT.[JobVersionId]
WHERE CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION IS NOT NULL
AND ISNULL(CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION,0) <= @{activity('LookupNew').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}

SELECT DISTINCT 
		ISNULL(MAX(CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION),0) AS SYS_CHANGE_VERSION	   
FROM CHANGETABLE(CHANGES dbo.tbl_job_versions,0) CT
LEFT JOIN dbo.tbl_job_versions F
 ON CT.[JobVersionId] = F.[JobVersionId]
WHERE ISNULL(CT.[SYS_CHANGE_VERSION],'') > ''
SELECT SYS_CHANGE_VERSION FROM ChangeTracking_Fabric_Update WHERE TableName = 'tbl_job_versions'
